text: Agar Allah Taalaa ka fazal-o-reham tujh per na hota to inn kay aik jamat to tujhay behkaney ka qasad ker hi liya tha magar dar asal yeh apney aap ko hi gumrah kertay hain yeh tera kuch nahi bigar saktay Allah Taalaa ney tujh per kitab-o-hikmat utari hai aur tujhay woh sikhaya hai jisay tu nahi janta tha aur Allah Taalaa ka tujh per bara bhari fazal hai
